## AuthorizationDecision enum

Decisions for authorization

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ABSTAIN | <code>&quot;Abstain&quot;</code> | No decision |
|  ALLOW | <code>&quot;Allow&quot;</code> | Access allowed |
